channel.title: Help
channel.description: ok i got a problem with my trade i added antidupe to it but u can still dupe so um when u trade the person put up ags and hit accept first time the then hit declien second time the person dcs and i get the weapon but he declined it so and he has it to how do i fix this does anybody got a good trade system that doesnt allow dupe at all
